headline: Is It Too Late To Consider KLA (KLAC) After Its 121% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether KLA's share price still makes sense after its huge run, this article will walk through what the current valuation might be telling you. KLA closed at US$1,543.03, with a 1.6% decline over the last 7 days, a 20.6% gain over the last 30 days, a 21.1% gain year to date, a 121.5% return over the past year, and a very large gain over 5 years. This article was prompted as part of ongoing coverage, and recent attention around KLA has focused on its role in the...
